15 namespace raylib {
16  class Rectangle : public ::Rectangle {
17  public:
18  Rectangle(::Rectangle vec) {
19  set(vec);
20  };
21  Rectangle(float X = 0, float Y = 0, float Width = 0, float Height = 0) {
22  x = X;
23  y = Y;
24  width = Width;
25  height = Height;
26  };

43  inline Rectangle& Draw(::Color color) {
44  ::DrawRectangle(static_cast<int>(x), static_cast<int>(y), static_cast<int>(width), static_cast<int>(height), color);
45  return *this;
46  }
47  inline Rectangle& Draw(::Vector2 origin, float rotation, ::Color color) {
48  ::DrawRectanglePro(*this, origin, rotation, color);
49  return *this;
50  }

54  return *this;
55  }

83  return *this;
84  }

86  inline bool CheckCollision(::Rectangle rec2) const {
87  return ::CheckCollisionRecs(*this, rec2);
88  }
89 
90  inline Rectangle GetCollision(::Rectangle rec2) const {
91  return ::GetCollisionRec(*this, rec2);
92  }
93 
94  inline bool CheckCollision(::Vector2 point) const {
95  return ::CheckCollisionPointRec(point, *this);
96  }
